name: Yvette Bradley
text: The guy that took my order was funnyðŸ˜„nice...the gal that brought out the pizza was scaryðŸ˜±mean...I was told the pizza's were the same as the regular store but just dont have everything on their menu...I told the ðŸ˜±ðŸ˜  gal the crust was â€¦More

name: Vergie Zhao
text: 2 kids and I shared a large pizza while biking around the city. Frankly, I didn't expect much but was pleasantly surprised. Pizza had a nice crust, both crisp and chewy. Plenty of sauce that was not a sweet as usual and enough cheese to satisfy my kids as well. Will definitely go back again.

name: Jim Herman
text: Good pizza made fast in a convenient location from my grandkids house. Staff was friendly and courteous.

name: D.A. Horton
text: Friendly service. Pizza was under cooked and very doughy.

name: Kristopher Seaver
text: Order was 15 mins past time and is located in a gas station couldn't give me a total over the phone

name: David Shandy
text: Every pizza we've purchased here has been excellent.  Highly recommend.

name: Roxy 7.0
text: Their pizza is really good. They are ahead of the competition like Pizza Hut and even Papa Johns simply for one reason: they loaded our pizza with toppings. It was a great value, we used a $9.99 large specialty coupon and the pizza was â€¦More

name: rebecca collum
text:
we are impressed... its been a long time since we've had a pizza out that has been this good...and you can't beat the price.  kudo's to the night crew!! keep up the good work guys and girls,and we'll keep coming back!!
thanks, Becky and Rick in Parkville MO
